result.execSummary:
The defendant Bradley W Koerner was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Fine to be paid within 60 days.  Penalty of civil judgment for non-payment.

Costs to be paid along with fine payments.

Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Bradley W Koerner

defendant.name: Koerner, Bradley W
defendant.address: 2605 S. Calhoun Road #207, New Berlin, WI 53151

records.addlTxt: with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

10:24 AM District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin by Niki Kane. Defendant Bradley W Koerner in court. 

The Court conducts a colloquy with the Defendant as it relates to his waiver of right to an attorney.
The Defendant wishes to waive his right to an attorney.
The Court finds that the Defendant is freely, knowingly, and voluntarily waiving his right to an attorney.

The Court conducts a plea colloquy with the Defendant.
The Defendant pleads guilty to Count 1.
The Court finds the Defendant guilty of Count 1.

The State gives its sentencing recommendation.
The Defense gives its sentencing recommendation.
The Defendant presents a statement.


Court orders the following:
	
Fine:  $379.00
DNA Sample and Surcharge:  $200.00
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
Payment of Fine/Forfeiture/Costs/Surcharges:  To be paid in 60 days. Civil judgment to be entered as penalty for non payment.

HOW TO PAY:
Payments can be made on-line with a MasterCard or electronic check at:  http://wcca.wicourts.gov  (Read the agreement, then click "I agree," then click "Pay fees on-line.")  OR you may contact the Waukesha County Clerk of Courts Business Center at 262-548-7497.
Pre-trial conference on August 26, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant to comply with I.D. Processing.  Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed.  Defendant not to possess any drug paraphernalia.

09:29 AM Defendant Brandon S Koerner in court.  Christian Farina appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense acknowledges receipt of complaint and waives reading of complaint.  Service admitted/advised of charges and potential penalties.  Court advises of right to an attorney.  Defendant to apply at Public Defender's Office for representation.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED BY COURT.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 26, 2022 at 08:30 am.
State's Demand for Discovery and Inspection and Notice of Intent to Use Defendant's Statement and DNA Evidence.
